SecurityTools.title: Security & Encryption
SecurityTools.description: Suite of security tools including AES, RSA, Bcrypt, JWT, HMAC, and Hashing.

PdfTools.title: PDF Tools
PdfTools.description: All-in-one PDF utilities: Merge, Split, and Convert to Image.

DataTools.title: Data Manipulation Suite
DataTools.description: A collection of tools for data conversion, formatting, and processing.

TextTools.title: Text & Content Suite
TextTools.description: Tools for text processing, OCR, and content generation.

DevTools.title: Dev & Infra Suite
DevTools.description: Developer utilities for Docker, permissions, and validation.

AesCrypto.title: AES Encryption
AesCrypto.description: Securely encrypt and decrypt text using AES-GCM algorithm directly in your browser.

BcryptGenerator.title: Bcrypt Generator
BcryptGenerator.description: Generate and verify Bcrypt passwords hashes for secure authentication.

HmacGenerator.title: HMAC Generator
HmacGenerator.description: Create Hash-based Message Authentication Codes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256).

RsaGenerator.title: RSA Key Generator
RsaGenerator.description: Generate RSA Public and Private Key pairs (PEM format).
